content: Develop a Node.js server using Express framework that serves static files from a specified directory and provides RESTful API endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting records in a MongoDB collection called "products". Each product record should contain fields for "name", "description", "price", and "quantity".

Alright, I'm going to walk you through setting up a Node.js server with Express that serves static files and interacts with a MongoDB database to manage a "products" collection. Sounds good?

First things first, you'll need to have Node.js and MongoDB installed on your machine. Have you got those set up already?
